entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 8:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
